item.title: Seasonal changes in phytoplankton biomass on the western Agulhas Bank, South Africa
Environmental and biological monitoring for forecasting anchovy recruitment in the southern Benguela upwelling region
Multiple factors affecting South African anchovy recruitment in the spawning, transport and nursery areas
The effect of sea temperature and food availability on the spawning success of Cape anchovy textitEngraulis capensis in the southern Benguela
